agencyContext.responsibleContact:
<#if name?exists>${name}
<#if postCode?exists>postcode: ${postCode}
<#if city?exists> city: ${city}
<#if phoneNumber?exists>phoneNumber: ${phoneNumber}
<#if email?exists>email: ${email}

dataProtectionOfficer.agencyResponsibleContact: The responsible party has not appointed a data protection officer. For enquiries regarding data protection, please use the contact details of the responsible provider.
dataProtectionOfficer.alternativeRepresentativeContact: The responsible party has not appointed a data protection officer. Please use the following contact data for inquiries regarding data protection: ${phoneNumber} ${email}
dataProtectionOfficer.dataProtectionOfficerContact:
<#if name?exists>${name}
<#if postCode?exists>postcode: ${postCode}
<#if city?exists> city: ${city}
<#if phoneNumber?exists>phoneNumber: ${phoneNumber}
<#if email?exists>email: ${email}

noAgencyContext.responsibleContact: The responsible party can only be displayed once a counselling centre has been selected. Please select a counselling centre.
noAgencyContext.dataProtectionOfficerContact: The contact details of the data protection office can only be displayed once counselling centre has been selected. Please select a counselling centre.
